name: Blinding Spray
originalText:
Creatures your opponents control get -4/-0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.

rulings.text: Blinding Spray doesn’t affect creatures that enter the battlefield or come under the control of one of your opponents after it resolves.
You can cast Blinding Spray even if your opponents control no creatures just to draw a card.
